content: New here, successfully compiled brlcad from source with opencl enabled , and have gone through the patch deployment instructions
@Sean any ideas on which patch i can work on ? given that i have a short time period?

@Amit Kumar Nandi that is not a simple decision for us to say to you because we do not know your skills, and you are likely not at all familiar with BRL-CAD. Your best best it so compile from source (see our website for instructions), then look at the BUGS or TODO file for something you think you might be able to investigate and work on. If you ask, we can help explain any of the BUGS/TODO items to let you know if they're reasonable. or provide tips on a specific issue.
